name: Pirate Riot
description:
Defeat rival ships and become the master of the seas!

Initially started as a single work day, 8 hour jam game for practice.  Later added the start screen and enemy respawning to complete the basic play.

  • David McCully
  • Ben Miller
  • Evan Allred
  • Colton Bradshaw
  • Emily Turley
  • Ed Rojas
  • Travis Costello
  • Jessica Woroniak
  • Sam Hoyal
